title: Can you name one universal truth? - Quora

response.answer_text: That care heals everything.  I was sociopath who didn't believe in any social relationship. I hate people. Maybe it was one of the factor that make me have mental disorder, 2 years ago I was diagnosed with it. I was the one who trusted noone and stand on my own foot for everything, broke. I became dependent almost in everything. I was sucked in my disease, up down facing severe depression and mania. I started to have disabilities in social interaction and taking care of myself. Spending times in my rooms for days during depression time and hanging out like crazy during mania. I destroyed my academic life. People started to recognize that I was "insane", that was stigma started. It was dark, I felt I lost everything : friends, trusts, hopes. Medicine didn't work for me. At the peak of my hopelessness, there was this guy that attract me. He is nice and kind. In short, we become friends and I told everything to him my burdens. Surprisingly, he dont judge and listen, and stay. For the first time, I'm attached to someone emotionally, and his existence heals me drastically. I am alot better now and step by step I learn how to engage emotionally to more people. For this nice guy who keep staying, thank you :)

I believe that the definition is important here, so I will preface my one and only universal truth with qualifiers:To my thought processes, universal truth follows these parameters:1) Universal means that - it exists for all elements, dimensions, macro and micro2) It has to be proven as universal cannot exist as a belief or personal revelation3) It cannot be disproved, but can be modified as we increase our understanding.  My one universal truth: Change is constant. This satisfies all qualification criteria

I exist. That is the most proven fact, probably the only one, that I know. What I perceive is not proven to be real; my current perception - seeing my hand typing on a keyboard while letters appear in front of me on a monitor -, as well as my current action - typing - aren't proven whether they are real or just a figment of my imagination. For all I know, nothing else exist and it's just me and the things my mind create.

Seeing/colour 'is'Hearing/sound 'is'Feeling/feelings 'is'Smelling/odours 'is'Tasting/flavours 'is'Knowing/ideas (number, form and meaning) 'is'Power to pattern sensations in accord with ideas '... Consciousness 'is'... All else is illusion... Sensations patterned to represent Ideas.

Eventually you will die one day, and all the money and other things you possessed, for which you toiled day and night, will be passed onto somebody else. So apart from making money, try to make memories as well cause that is what you can claim to be yours.
Truth is direct correspondence with reality. Reality is that which is changeless. 1+1=2Every action has an opposite and equal action. What you sow, you reap.What is born must die.
You are always connected with nature, both internal and external, when you come to know that you will start living a wonderful life.
Very little is "infinite" except for the capability of stupidity in people.
